English.Text: An infuriating tangle! —by the expression of your trapped expeditioner at least. Every tug seems to tighten the gordian knot further. "Just cut it at the root!" they shout up. "Are you sure?" "Absolutely." When the lianas are cut there are seconds of freefall before the impact, which while slightly cushioned— like a fork wrapped in spaghetti verdi — results in a nasty back injury.
